pl_output:
`UWelcome to` `TCosmos``U!`

`UThe current version is` `C0.0.7``U.  To view patch notes, use` `Ppatch_notes``U.`

`TCosmos` `Uis currently in early access.  All user accounts made during this time will be created with an` `Vearly_access` `Uflag.  Upon the official release of` `TCosmos``U, it is very likely that all flagged accounts will be deleted.  Early play and feedback are both encouraged, but it should be understood that the game in its current state is not wholly representative of the finished product.  Please report all bugs you encounter to` `Municorn` `Uvia the unofficial hackmud Discord either in a private message or in the` `V#games` `Uchannel.`  `TThank you for your patience!`

`UIt is` `Vhighly recommended` `Uthat you set the following macro:`

`A/cosmos =` unicorn.cosmos `A{{` `Ncommand`: `V"{0=info}"``A,` `Ntarget`: `V"{1=info}"``A,` `Npointer`: `V"{2=info}"``A }}`

`UDoing so will enable you to provide efficient input and obtain information regarding nearly everything you can do in the game at any point.`  `TCosmos` `Uis also equipped with support for chatscripting.  Simply set the chat with` `A&`unicorn.cosmos `Uand then type out your space-delimited arguments.  In-game prompts for input will assume that you're using either the macro or the chatscript and will adhere to the following color-coded syntax:`

`Pcommand` `Starget` `Qpointer`
